CustomField.description: If set to true, the CreditBureauPaymentHistoryJob will be skipped from the standard SOD chain.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CreditBureauPaymentHistoryJob is used for reporting to creditbureaus. This may not be required by some customers as they have their own way of reporting the status. In such a case, they may want to skip this job from CL Loan's standard SOD chain.
CustomField.label: Skip Credit Bureau Payment History
